Content_wSideColumn.Title: Sports Camp: Activities
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: Ultimate Frisbee, Tennis, Soccer, Volleyball, and Basketball - we encourage age appropiate youth to come and participate no matter their skill level. This will provide youth the opportunity to experience five different sports and develop sportsmanship etiquette. Youth with be divided up into teams based on team level.

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Ultimate Frisbee, Tennis, Soccer, Volleyball, and Basketball - we encourage age appropiate youth to come and participate no matter their skill level. This will provide youth the opportunity to experience five different sports and develop sportsmanship etiquette. Youth with be divided up into teams based on team level.

Tournaments will be held daily from 2 - 4p.m. and will provide an opportunity for youth to play as a team against other teams in the camp. Tournaments are a time for athletes to play the sport they have learned that day, but also to demonstrate the things they have learned in the devotional such as sportsmanship. Parents are invited and encouraged to come to support their youth during this time.

Summer Sports Camp provides a wonderful opportunity for youth to meet new people and make many new friends. Each day youth will be a part of a different team, where they will be given team-building exercises at the beginning of the day to encourage youth to work together and build friendships. Devotionals will teach the importance of each member of the team.
